title: GNU Linux-Libre 6.7 Kernel Released for Those Seeking 100% Freedom for Their PCs
description:
GNU Linux-Libre 6.7 kernel is now available for download. This release is based on Linux kernel 6.7 and it’s targeted at those who seek 100% freedom for their personal computers.

The post GNU Linux-Libre 6.7 Kernel Released for Those Seeking 100% Freedom for Their PCs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
